law.catch_line: Program for repayment of educational loans for primary health-care professionals who agree to serve in federally designated health professional shortage areas.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 342, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 286, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 512, Part 1., sec. 115, effective July 15, 1994.
